SEARCH
Module proj.ingsw.rj
Package it.polimi.ingsw.mechanics

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.mechanics.GameController
public class GameController extends Object
Calls the VirtualView to sent messages to the Client. Receives messages from the Clients and defines the relative behavior of the Game.

    Extracts the coordinates of the selected cards from the message and checks its validity (does not call the method to remove them from the board)

    • broadcastMessage

      public void broadcastMessage(MessageType type, Object... payload)
      Sends the same message to all the players
      Parameters:
      type - of the message
      payload - eventual attributes of the message to send

    • cardSelection

      public void cardSelection(SelectionRequest message)
      Extracts the coordinates of the selected cards from the message and checks its validity (does not call the method to remove them from the board)
      Parameters:
      message - message sent by the client with the coordinates of the selected cards

    • cardInsertion

      public void cardInsertion(InsertionRequest message)
      Calls the game command to insert the cards selected by the player into his bookshelf
      Parameters:
      message - Message containing the cards arranged in the order picked by the player and the column into which he wants to put them in his bookshelf

    • findWinner

      public void findWinner()
      Scores the private goal for every player and creates the final scoreboard announcing the winner
